					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[fade into. . .]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/fade-into/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 05 Jun 2020 16:08:58 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=261</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Seven weeks heavy, fifty years pushing birthdays through holidays. We don't do anything, anymore. Somehow the world keeps changing itself. There is at least that.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":262,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/photo_2020-06-05_11-06-24-1024x755.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-262"/><figcaption>Phrasing courtesy of @mynameisphlegm via Instagram</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Never be surprised by the disappointment that those closest will provide you. Nobody holds your hand at the end. THANK YOU FOR THIS <a href="https://www.instagram.com/mynameisphlegm">https://www.instagram.com/mynameisphlegm</a>/</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

										<category domain="category" nicename="other"><![CDATA[Other]]></category>
						</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[I beg you rot]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/i-beg-you-rot/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 28 Jun 2020 21:27:49 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=282</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Inferno: Canto I</strong><br>Midway upon the journey of our life<br>I found myself within a forest dark,<br>For the straightforward pathway had been lost.<br>Ah me! how hard a thing it is to say<br>What was this forest savage, rough, and stern,<br>Which in the very thought renews the fear.<br>So bitter is it, death is little more;<br>But of the good to treat, which there I found,<br>Speak will I of the other things I saw there.<br>I cannot well repeat how there I entered,<br>So full was I of slumber at the moment<br>In which I had abandoned the true way.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I am stowed away in the guest bathroom which will now serve as an office (of sorts) and a hideaway. I carry a heavier burden than just last week, the weight of my own Rube Goldberg Machine and something quite small in sentence structure (if I were to share) but heavier than anything known in this universe. I carry it for you. And never again will you be alone to drag _this_ in solitude. I got you.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>282</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-06-28 21:27:49]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-06-28 21:27:49]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2020-06-28 21:27:49]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2020-06-28 21:27:49]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[i-beg-you-rot]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>

										<category domain="category" nicename="novel"><![CDATA[Life by Dictionary, a novel]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="other"><![CDATA[Other]]></category>
						</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Choose Your Failure Wisely]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/choose-your-failure-wisely/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 01 Jul 2020 19:26:21 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=285</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:image {"id":286,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/photo_2020-07-01_14-22-39.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-286"/><figcaption>Photo courtesy @hollarrr via Instagram/FB</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The holidays will wrap around this quarantine until the only music is the ringing inside my head. That pitch that won't quit its burrowing down beneath the dread and daytime. Come night at least there is the hum of streetlights to accompany the tones of gray and tan and golden.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>285</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-07-01 19:26:21]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-07-01 19:26:21]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2020-07-01 19:26:21]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2020-07-01 19:26:21]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[choose-your-failure-wisely]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="category" nicename="other"><![CDATA[Other]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="photographs"><![CDATA[Photographs]]></category>
						</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[We Deserve the Worst]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/we-deserve-the-worst/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 11 Jul 2020 10:18:30 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=288</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>All of it--a whisper across a crowded room speaking of memories about a dream where the ghosts phased in and out of view. The festival fun-house of weird mirrors and strobe-lights. What is reality anyway?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The chimera need not touch your shoulder: only give the impression they are about to. A feather across the back of her neck. How your senses heighten and you do not know the why.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I think of those who got out of here early by either age or disease, tragedies or their own hand. What long gauze scarves are they spinning about in the ether between worlds?  All of it now almost gone completely away. The intimacy left to starve on the sidewalk or bake itself to crust from the sunlight. Friendships became the occasional letter (by text or email, phone- or video-call) and also joined the petrified collection inside our heads to gather more dust. Our own skin settling down to bury us, month after month after endless days that no longer are counted or known in their regular order.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I was miserable and lost before the End began. I am built for survival without your help. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":291,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/photo_2020-07-11_05-22-00-1024x838.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-291"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>288</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-07-11 10:18:30]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-07-11 10:18:30]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2020-07-11 10:18:30]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2020-07-11 10:18:30]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[we-deserve-the-worst]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="category" nicename="other"><![CDATA[Other]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="pandemic"><![CDATA[Pandemic]]></category>
						</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Event Horizon]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/event-horizon/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 15 Jul 2020 16:38:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=294</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>There was never going to be another escape route. Happiness would not open trap doors where you could side-step right into a deep and longer-lasting bliss.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><em>Tech support lines are busy. Please try again at a later hour. Life has appreciated your business. Thank you, come again.</em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Life inside the new helmets where breath is analyzed on its way in &amp; out. The heads-up-display visor seamlessly weaves the virtual with what may or may not be real. Who cares what they look like IRL any longer? Real-time hologram projections. All the pretty ones at the mall gathering to oh and ah at each other drinking their cafe fizzes. My pet dog has a cyborg kangaroo that keeps her on leash. Frik and Frak they're named. Frik and Frak stay behind me as I float along the mechanized sidewalks, hand on sword and hand on blaster.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Maybe the coma will be a dream. Maybe the dream will be less painful than this.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="category" nicename="other"><![CDATA[Other]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="pandemic"><![CDATA[Pandemic]]></category>
						</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Middle Morning Misery]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/middle-morning-misery/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 17 Jul 2020 15:04:03 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=296</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Some days it is just too much. The defenses are worn and tired. Just tired. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":297,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/photo_2020-07-17_10-02-58-852x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-297"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It was never anything better than a deathtrap. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>296</wp:post_id>

		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>

		<category domain="category" nicename="pandemic"><![CDATA[Pandemic]]></category>
						</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Pomegranate Seeds Everywhere]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/pomegranate-seeds-everywhere/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 23 Jul 2020 16:11:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=300</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Composed and clear-headed at sunrise. Confident that I have survived every self-set trap and labyrinth to amount to something different than this.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Mid-day and I am defeat. Causation or correlation?  First time the thought slipped by the tongue and I am not even phased. <em>Persephone, where are we?</em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>300</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-07-23 16:11:54]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-07-23 16:11:54]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2020-07-23 16:11:54]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2020-07-23 16:11:54]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>

		<title><![CDATA[This is neither yesterday nor tomorrow]]></title>

		<pubDate>Sat, 25 Jul 2020 14:43:32 +0000</pubDate>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Prove you were even here to begin with.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":307,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/motorcycle-de-768x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-307"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Up Next: All We Ever Wanted]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/up-next-all-we-ever-wanted/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 26 Jul 2020 11:58:47 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=310</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Stop stressing over everything. It will all be okay even if it is horrible. Don't live a life in the shadows and complain about the light OR the dark. We got this. We got this.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><em><strong>om mani padme hum</strong></em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":311,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/photo_2020-07-26_06-55-23-1024x768.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-311"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[half year gone]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/half-year-gone/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 28 Jul 2020 10:31:55 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=320</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Do not cut hair again</li><li>Enjoy the completion of a productive day</li><li>Do not tie success to any reward</li><li>Re-imagine success outside the scope of paid work</li><li>Tell friends you love them</li><li>Take naps</li><li>Keep the mind in motion, the body at rest--now switch that up</li><li>Do not apologize to shut somebody down/up. Realize why you're sorry &amp; and what actions led to this</li><li>Be unapologetic in selfishness and selflessness</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<category domain="category" nicename="pandemic"><![CDATA[Pandemic]]></category>
						</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Cerulean]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/cerulean/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 31 Jul 2020 04:58:41 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=322</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>An off-key flute. May the songs of Pan accompany us here on out. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><em>Corny. Always too corny and afraid to speak even with myself honestly. Ugh.</em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Correction (and later edit): I am fearful of speaking truth outside of my circle of One.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>322</wp:post_id>

		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>

		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="category" nicename="pandemic"><![CDATA[Pandemic]]></category>
						</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[the ideas we live by were once just a guess]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/the-ideas-we-live-by-were-once-just-a-guess/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 14 Aug 2020 23:37:26 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=326</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>End of September I will have lived (mostly) a cleaner life. Sober almost the entirety of. But Not completely and I have to be honest with myself first. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":330,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/takeme-880x1024.jpeg" alt="" class="wp-image-330"/><figcaption>Take me to a world I won't know</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Four a.m. coffee and a light breakfast. Wake, brew, browse social media to see the shenanigans old friends have been getting into while I tossed and turned lost between dream, nightmare, semi-awake and permanent loneliness/lust.<br>Four-oh-seven a.m. and another listen through of OK COMPUTER.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I miss dancing and laughter and I am forgetting what excitement human touch once brought.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2020-08-14 23:37:26]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2020-08-14 23:37:26]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[we never saw this coming]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/we-never-saw-this-coming/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 16 Aug 2020 10:11:45 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=334</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Don't blame us! How could we have known?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":335,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/photo_2020-08-16_05-09-00-768x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-335"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Some folk just aren't built for this world. The weirdos who held on as long as they could. . .</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I am in debt to today. Tax collection of thought in arrears. Let the robes fall to the floor. Walk with deliberateness and naked toward the moments just before and after. You can't do this without yourself.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>334</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-08-16 10:11:45]]></wp:post_date>

		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2020-08-16 10:11:45]]></wp:post_modified>

						</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[placeholder for a heart]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/placeholder-for-a-heart/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 17 Aug 2020 16:22:34 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=339</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:image {"id":340,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/photo_2020-08-17_11-21-29-1024x912.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-340"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Just micro-bursts near the heart, below the head, and or and to the right of my gut. Fireworks with little warning. Recurring bubble of tears that is comfort.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><em>We never knew. How could we?</em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<title><![CDATA[Rapidly Intensify]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/rapidly-intensify/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 24 Aug 2020 23:52:05 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=344</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>And then disappear. All of this was a dream, but the only single one that a person gets. A wraparound that goes much more quickly near the end.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":345,"sizeSlug":"large","className":"is-style-rounded"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large is-style-rounded"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/photo_2020-08-24_18-50-40-1024x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-345"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It really does end in tears.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[You May Want to Sit Down]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/you-may-want-to-sit-down/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 26 Aug 2020 12:30:01 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=347</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The sleep gives a bit of happiness. Exercise does. But the sadness returns. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Every distraction has been muted. Nothing titillates. Desire gone.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":348,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/photo_2020-08-26_07-29-00-768x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-348"/><figcaption><strong><em>I'm trying to understand what happened to me.</em></strong></figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>347</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-08-26 12:30:01]]></wp:post_date>

		<category domain="category" nicename="photographs"><![CDATA[Photographs]]></category>
						</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Prescription Expiration Proclamation]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/prescription-expiration-proclamation/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 27 Aug 2020 00:47:09 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=352</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true,"fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap has-normal-font-size">I want to be lost in a revolving, light-trap door between the waking world and a woke sleep-walk darkroom where our insides glow like they've developer still wet in crevices. No more canards &amp; doublespeak.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">Say say say it clearly. I am the color between the watch-hands. The moment after it all ended. Stop bath before you climb into bed tonight.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

										<category domain="category" nicename="pandemic"><![CDATA[Pandemic]]></category>
						</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Three, You Slowly Spread the Net]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/three-you-slowly-spread-the-net/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 27 Aug 2020 16:07:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=354</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">Guilt. Of abandonment (hers) and then that which I visited on her near the end when she needed me to just be the child I once was. That would have taken so little effort. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Not even five months yet has passed so I'm not surprised there has been no let-up in this guilt. The mania I am always a step behind now that I no longer self-medicate. The drag-down depression of boots stuck in muck, that suck sound loud in my ears. The tinnitus' only companion.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":355,"sizeSlug":"large","className":"is-style-default"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large is-style-default"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/photo_2020-08-27_11-06-08-1002x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-355"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">Halfway to 100 was going to be spectacular, and it has been but only in that upside down way that depression becomes comfortable and familiar. I have trained myself to be anxious when happiness tries to backdoor itself between the moments of the day. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">I don't trust myself any longer.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

		<category domain="category" nicename="photographs"><![CDATA[Photographs]]></category>
						</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[I AM MIMEOGRAPH]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/i-am-mimeograph/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 07 Oct 2020 12:30:30 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=363</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I do not see a return to pre-pandemic life. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you're a tinkering human please check out <a href="https://github.com/llamakc/LttR" data-type="URL" data-id="https://github.com/llamakc/LttR">Listen to the Radio</a>, a shell script for college radio stations that <a href="http://quantifier.org" data-type="URL" data-id="http://quantifier.org">Quantifier</a> and I are favorable of.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Perhaps 2021 will be the year I carve or bully space out of my time, life, living situation to begin painting in earnest. I hope so.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Meanwhile more bits of whatever life was before THIS continue to shed away into the bottom of the hourglass. The sands mixed and copies of one another. Who can tell anything apart any longer? The blue ink stains that show which of us are still tied to every simulation: our minds lost in transit.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":364,"width":566,"height":410,"sizeSlug":"large","className":"is-style-rounded"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large is-resized is-style-rounded"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/photo_2020-10-07_07-29-17-1024x743.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-364" width="566" height="410"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>363</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-10-07 12:30:30]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-10-07 12:30:30]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2020-10-07 12:30:30]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2020-10-07 12:30:30]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[i-am-mimeograph]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>

						</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[The Day Before the Day After]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/the-day-before-the-day-after/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 08 Oct 2020 15:36:48 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=366</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:image {"id":367,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/photo_2020-10-08_10-34-19.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-367"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>For years I have walked from one faraway place to the next.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[(un)still life]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/unstill-life/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 08 Oct 2020 17:42:43 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=369</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I just don't know how I and everything I understand fell apart, so quickly. . .</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":370,"sizeSlug":"large","className":"is-style-default"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large is-style-default"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/photo_2020-10-08_12-41-02-768x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-370"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The dead are forgotten. Perhaps the moment before or after the forgetfulness we remember them. But ultimately we survive by letting go. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The friends who have gone before me I have let fall into the tide of memory. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I am unable to let my mother's death go. I am not well.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>369</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-10-08 17:42:43]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-10-08 17:42:43]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2020-10-08 17:42:43]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2020-10-08 17:42:43]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[unstill-life]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>

		<category domain="category" nicename="photographs"><![CDATA[Photographs]]></category>
						</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Unlearn Something Everyday]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/unlearn-something-everyday/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 17 Oct 2020 11:43:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=373</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Reach back and grab a memory. Throw it in the air with a flourish. Let it float down, caught in the late afternoon sunlight. A color, a color. Glint in the eyes. We were happy. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":374,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/photo_2020-10-17_06-36-44-1024x768.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-374"/><figcaption>A year ago, and six months before you left.</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p> </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Read this at its home, please:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Passive in Revolution</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:verse -->
<pre class="wp-block-verse">grief sharpens us
turns us into the ghosts we are

slap happy in the world&nbsp;
you can't survive living



i have adjusted my expectations around you</pre>
<!-- /wp:verse -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Go to <a href="https://solidquarter.blogspot.com/2020/10/passive-in-revolution.html?m=1" data-type="URL" data-id="https://solidquarter.blogspot.com/2020/10/passive-in-revolution.html?m=1" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Solid Quarter</a> for the rest. . .</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:embed {"url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HXaEAoRUkfE","type":"video","providerNameSlug":"youtube","responsive":true,"className":"wp-embed-aspect-4-3 wp-has-aspect-ratio"} -->

<!-- /wp:embed -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I began again today on the twenty-third day of October in the year 2020 on a manuscript that has suffered fits, coughs, and slumber. But now, one day at a time. . .</p>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[mEMORY sCREEN]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/memory-screen/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 29 Oct 2020 14:24:09 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=385</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You did this all to yourself. You were not tricked or pulled up to the crossroads. Failure or falling in any direction happens at the same rate: </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><em><strong>q u i c k l y.</strong></em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You did this to yourself. Look back at the wake of destruction or let-down. The telltale eddies and tidewater fuck-all full of your deceit and self-preservation.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You did this to yourself. So when memory begins its opaque screen-slide into this "real" world do not be surprised. Please accept yourself and just choose a direction. You can do any of this for yourself.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":386,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/photo_2020-10-29_09-23-18-1024x768.jpg" alt="mEMORY sCREEN" class="wp-image-386"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>385</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-10-29 14:24:09]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-10-29 14:24:09]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2020-10-29 14:24:09]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2020-10-29 14:24:09]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[memory-screen]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>

		<category domain="category" nicename="photographs"><![CDATA[Photographs]]></category>
						</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Wipe that smile off my face]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/wipe-that-smile-off-my-face/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 30 Oct 2020 19:04:24 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=389</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It's just depression. It goes away. You're just sad again. It will go away. The toilet is running again. I've fixed it so many times and the trend is always toward another slow leak. Water leaving to rejoin water.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Shake the handle. Shake it free.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":390,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/photo_2020-10-30_13-58-35-1024x974.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-390"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Loneliness isn't a problem. So far nobody has called. Just I &amp; I.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Crooked Power Everywhere]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/crooked-power-everywhere/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 01 Nov 2020 23:31:42 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=392</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">I have installed this camera to watch myself. A reminder to needle-pin my dreams each new day. To-do list of duh and don't. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":393,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/photo_2020-11-01_17-27-21-1024x949.jpg" alt="Crooked Power Everywhere" class="wp-image-393"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>392</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2020-11-01 23:31:42]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2020-11-01 23:31:42]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2020-11-01 23:31:42]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2020-11-01 23:31:42]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[crooked-power-everywhere]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="category" nicename="pandemic"><![CDATA[Pandemic]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="photographs"><![CDATA[Photographs]]></category>
						</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Cruise Cruising Cruiser]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/cruise-cruising-cruiser/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 03 Nov 2020 11:15:32 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=395</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">Waking without The Hunger is the best feeling I've had since the birth of my children. I did this without your help. I won't forget.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":396,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/photo_2020-11-03_05-10-57-860x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-396"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I've no dream to share. No two-liner pulled from an unfinished poem. It's novel month and frankly I write less as this time of year slows down for me. The margins become crunched with favors and reflection.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I am awake and still here for a reason. <em>When was the last time I believed that?</em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>395</wp:post_id>

		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2020-11-03 11:15:32]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2020-11-03 11:15:32]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[cruise-cruising-cruiser]]></wp:post_name>

<p class="has-drop-cap">Think. But I’ll do the opposite. Underworld-bent on self destruction. Alarm clock in reverse. <br><br></p>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[remember dates not details]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/we-remember-dates-and-not-details/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 08 Nov 2020 02:49:08 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=406</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:verse -->
<pre class="wp-block-verse">Shuffle all y'all Polaroids for the cut-fresh hand. Them skeletons dance before break fast. He/him picked marigolds from the neutral ground for her crown
--O queen of daybreak or/and prince of knives 
where is yor' magick 
     bag of mushroom dust? Where went the kick-drums that kept time inside our boomerang of hearts?

Tell us the barber's chair 
which nicks ankle and kneecap. Spin &amp; sit &amp; 
spit &amp; nip at the Irish creams and hot Toddys before 
the port-o-lets transform this East Bank Tardis--FULL STOP

whisked away to the staccato knocking from the next person, or persons, who request relief by evacuation or consumption

STUMBLE again into faceless crowds of everyone you now know. The living-- the living---of what the long dance is.  
</pre>
<!-- /wp:verse -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[The king is dead]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/the-king-is-dead/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 10 Nov 2020 23:43:58 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=410</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:image {"id":411,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/13ECF89C-2289-4C06-9BA2-812B02EFCA83.jpeg" alt="High resolution image of human cell. Photograph not mine" class="wp-image-411"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Still time to write. <br>Still time to paint. <br>Time left for laughter or love and disappointment. I just need to find the correct watch and sync it (again again again) with that clock which hides under a rock near the river. <br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">Come sit by this fire and travel with me—somewhere happiness opens up like (<em>the part of you goes right here</em>)</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

		<title><![CDATA[Danger Close]]></title>

		<pubDate>Wed, 18 Nov 2020 23:07:12 +0000</pubDate>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">What a relief to not worry about myself any longer. There comes a point where along this journey you can see neither end of the path. That's okay. After hope there is the big Chill. The greater dream that stripped itself bare while tripping on its own tentacles. The chickens only showed up to gather what was left before the dusts came.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[when lunch break meant something different]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/when-lunch-break-meant-something-different/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 30 Nov 2020 18:17:41 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=430</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">It is morning and I can not wake up. The waterbed has a small leak. All of my clothes are musty and smell of fried foods. The endless part-time jobs. We are in class in a makeshift school comprised of broken down buses.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":431,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/photo_2020-11-30_12-15-54-1024x587.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-431"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[entombment]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/entombment/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 04 Dec 2020 02:29:51 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=433</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">Anywhere may be an apartment complex. Just begin arguing with your lovers and neighbors.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":434,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/IMG_2157-1024x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-434"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[gentlefolk burn your seats for warmth]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/gentlefolk-burn-your-seats-for-warmth/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 11 Dec 2020 19:06:09 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=466</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">Blackjack dealer. Fancy hands. Nickname was Pet-food. Promised they would reshuffle my life deck and get things back on track. Returned each payday for Pet-food to light some sage, put on a bit of slow jazz, and dance the oversized playing cards back and forth.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>"Not this time, Mr. Ken. You come back next week. Better luck."</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Assume the worst and expect a close facsimile. And pay for it all.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":467,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/photo_2020-12-11_13-00-21-768x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-467"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>

		<title><![CDATA[chaos in the quiet]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/chaos-in-the-quiet/</link>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">I can not name a single thing enjoyed anymore. No praxis, no compleat relaxation through work. Not cooking, reading, writing, skating, thinking. Not even the search for an answer to the why of this. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Cold and windy for the rest of my days. Old and whiny from here on out. . .</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">O I wish I could call you today for your birthday. We'd laugh at and through this inchworm apocalyptic absurdity, and end the phone call with "talk soon" instead of goodbyes. You are always loved. I carry you with me.</p>

		<title><![CDATA[I'm not feeding off you]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/im-not-feeding-off-you/</link>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">This encampment straddled parts of the grand walkway of an abandoned amusement park. Rusted roller coaster tracks and trestles provided the skeleton for kudzu to spread up and over. This kept the afternoon sun off of those who now called this home. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

						<wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[450]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Love Letters to All Y'all]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/love-letters-to-all-yall/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 27 Dec 2020 16:15:57 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=505</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">Who continued to give me your time. Allowed me the space to vent, and did so knowing it was part of this process to unravel all of the wrong-turned thoughts and decisions. Am I walking out of this maze forward or backward? Or is everything a labyrinth instead? No escape no tomorrow.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>But there is. It's there every single day ready for the taking. More on this later. I'm going to go kiss the foreheads that are nearby. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

		<title><![CDATA[See for yourself]]></title>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Only the dead will survive. <br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":508,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/D97057DA-4B4A-485B-BD68-1CEEF0834D33-765x1024.jpeg" alt="" class="wp-image-508"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[hotel lobby at dawn after a long night]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/hotel-lobby-at-dawn-after-a-long-night/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 30 Dec 2020 12:01:42 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=510</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">Hotel lobby at dawn after a long night. Elevator lights still sting our eyes. Christmas/holiday decorations are up as employees prepare for NYE celebrations at the end of the 1st Plague Year. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><em>Read your way out of this, Clark. There's no living escape. . .</em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Aircrew catch an early shuttle. Another family eager to check out argues over what was left upstairs in the room.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We balance drugs and alcohol like professional circus clowns: the vaudeville of it all. Either everyone in this lobby knows or none of them do. NO--that child knows. Let's find a bathroom and disappear again. Pink Palomino must be open by now.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">Everything was perfect from far away. The sirens and fireworks a messy jazz car crash nearing midnight. Nobody sees me here on the levee. Nobody sees me step over on to the backside. Nobody sees me slip into the treeline sliver that hides the river, waiting.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[NotOkay.dat]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/notokay-dat/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 02 Jan 2021 21:41:49 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=519</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>End of line —</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>write the codewords down in riddles. Hide yourself until you wake up happy. Everything is worth it. Even this Sargasso Sea. Keep afloat, you anchor-hearted fool. <br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>

		<pubDate>Sun, 07 Feb 2021 11:33:50 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=470</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The escape clause is written just beneath the skin. See it there under the UV light from the bug zapper over by that money machine? </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Easier to read the runes at night when the mole crickets hid from opossum. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><em>Looks like shitty tats</em>, ya said.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>That's all the future really is, my friends. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

		<title><![CDATA[machine scanning memory starting in 3, 2, 1]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/machine-scanning-memory-starting-in-3-2-1/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 28 Jan 2021 01:24:38 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=535</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>INTERRUPT INTERRUPT</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Void sequence halted. Entering rescue mode</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>rescue&gt; __</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Tabula Rasa. The carload of books I sold in Orlando for a bus ticket to dead-middle Texas. The shotgun's cold hello in a small town along the Colorado river. The same gun used to say goodbye. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>LOAD NEXT STAGE</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Arkansas. No. Reverse. Arkansas was before. You bused from Florida to Little Rock and tried to start over. Weakness. Loneliness. Sadness. You didn't fathom that it would get much more worse. That wasn't even a warm-up for what was to come.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":536,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/photo_2021-01-27_19-23-53-765x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-536"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Return. Without contest unlock all this confusion please.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I am lost lost l o s t . . .</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":248,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/photo_2020-05-24_09-55-37-768x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-248"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[TheDifficultPartsFirst()]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/thedifficultpartsfirst/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 30 Jan 2021 11:37:28 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=546</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:image {"id":547,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/photo_2021-01-30_05-20-25-1024x697.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-547"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">Caresses. Leg under leg. Small of a human's back. &gt;&gt; to the pandemic list of what disappears. How we never remember an event but instead only its memory. Somebody keep a record. Write it before the pens are gone and we've forgotten how to create.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>They hit the morgue before sunrise to collect bulk bones. Susan has a pop-up on the weekends at the corner bar where she sells reliquaries. She writes your memory down on paper. Folds the paper and ties it bone-side with twine. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>"Take this and place it in the darkest part where you sleep." </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><em>Think of it each night before the terrors come.</em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Nobody remembers how to kiss or dance. There is only the shuffle of queues.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

<p>Trapped with the veils wrapped around me. No waking nor slumber. Trying to not move but constantly fidgeting. Am I living or am I dead?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":552,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/photo_2021-02-02_05-41-57.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-552"/></figure>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[first time swimming / last time drowning]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/first-time-swimming-last-time-drowning/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 05 Feb 2021 17:07:14 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=561</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">I am scared. I don't remember when the mania arrived. Was it just now? How long have I been under the sheet ice? The real world right there on the other side. . .</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":431,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/photo_2020-11-30_12-15-54-1024x587.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-431"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Make no mistake though. I am enveloped now. I've become what I feared in others. I run sideways in a world of up/down elevators. Boxcars moving freight here to there and clue how to go up into the buildings or recover from the basements.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Lost in the corners again. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I'm only a placeholder. Keep the bed warm and the engine running. Soon to be replaced. Which variant next? Continue to carry on, comrade. Cold, crushed flowers on the roadside. Kick the can and bunker down. It is gonna be a long day in the brittle sun. Maybe night and its invisibility will bring a bit of warmth in hiding.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Boil Water Advisory]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/boil-water-advisory/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 18 Feb 2021 12:12:27 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=605</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">I manned the projectors in a 20+ screen theatre. Start times made no sense. There were people camping in the projection rooms. Their trashbag luggage scattered on stairs and platters.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I dropped my phone and froze. How to continue without it? What else would break and create another FULL STOP in this real or not real life?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":606,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/photo_2021-02-18_06-07-19-1024x576.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-606"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="category" nicename="dream-journal"><![CDATA[Dream Journal]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="pandemic"><![CDATA[Pandemic]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="photographs"><![CDATA[Photographs]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_thumbnail_id]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[606]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[let LOVE win]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/let-love-win/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 20 Feb 2021 11:20:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=608</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">You showed me how to dock a large boat at an overcrowded pier. The celestial timing of it all. The sun, moon, and Jupiter's faint reflection just through the fire-ravaged tree break. Behind us the next StratoSpaceLiner stood dick-hard forward for the morning's space launch.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>All these occurrences and still mouths to feed here in the town. Cities in ruin. Countries completely cut off from the connected world by choice or embargo.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>At the center of all these levels of hell is where heaven waits.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":609,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none","className":"is-style-rounded"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large is-style-rounded"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/photo_2021-02-20_05-19-11-1024x576.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-609"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>608</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2021-02-20 11:20:00]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2021-02-20 11:20:00]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2021-02-20 11:20:00]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2021-02-20 11:20:00]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[let-love-win]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>

		<category domain="category" nicename="photographs"><![CDATA[Photographs]]></category>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Notification: You Were Never Here]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/notification-you-were-never-here/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 24 Feb 2021 01:03:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=611</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Tracked like cattle. Seeds for next season's planting--left in a drawer with plastic buttons and zip-ties. A sub-number on a downward trending plan of inaction. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">Where did you go? Why were you parked out front tonight? Speeding off. Alone? Loneliness. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Crack your phones into tiny pieces. Eat the sim card with oat milk to wash it down. Who needs Valium in this world of gut punch after haymaker?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":612,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none","className":"is-style-rounded"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large is-style-rounded"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/photo_2021-02-23_19-02-05.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-612"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>611</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2021-02-24 01:03:00]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2021-02-24 01:03:00]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2021-02-24 01:03:00]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2021-02-24 01:03:00]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[we were crickets]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/we-were-crickets/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 24 Feb 2021 10:33:14 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=616</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:image {"id":668,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/photo_2021-03-18_07-18-06-835x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-668"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Wet (heavy) 4 a.m. air makes it difficult to glide between parked cars and gaslights. Make the intersection and scan for interlopers. Turn any direction from stumble of drunks. Tonight is the finale of a well-lived oeuvre. Come one, come all. <em>Comme</em> ci <em>comme ça</em>.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":617,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/photo_2021-02-24_04-27-11-1024x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-617"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Labyrinth]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/labyrinth/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 03 Mar 2021 19:40:24 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=621</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:image {"id":622,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Party.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-622"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><em>Escape-Me-Nots</em> is the yellow flower that topped the weeds in the highway median. Maybe they were not yellow. Orange or light red? I won't be sure until I see another growth sprouting up from temporary graves dug without pattern along the road.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":673,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/photo_2021-06-04_06-28-48-768x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-673"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2021-03-03 19:40:24]]></wp:post_date_gmt>

		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2021-03-03 19:40:24]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>

		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Wax Moon]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/wax-moon/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 05 Mar 2021 23:52:51 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=626</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column {"width":"100%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:100%"><!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:image {"id":628,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/photo_2021-03-05_17-44-52-1-1007x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-628"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>They stop talking and calling. Even your job sheds the robes of work and becomes its own cell-block. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">You were a functioning alcoholic until you became an addict. You kept not giving up until you did.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>All the sorry and second chances just mist beyond the levee. It goes away. It goes away and that's the saving grace these days.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:image {"id":629,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/photo_2021-03-05_17-43-32-768x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-629"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>There are torture techniques that mimic tinnitus. The high droning whine now a part of your every conscious moment. It wakes you and puts you to bed. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Complain and folks say "oh yeah, I got that problem too. It's not so bad though. . ."</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><em>Liars all. </em></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":664,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/photo_2021-03-05_17-43-32-768x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-664"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>

<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:media-text -->

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[I woke this morning]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/i-woke-this-morning/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 10 Apr 2022 13:33:03 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=408</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>AIM for the next night of dreams where I am the constant and the variable. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":938,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/photo_2022-04-10_08-24-03-1024x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-938"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A long walk soon. I walk it. Always walk.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[for those that would wish us well]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/for-those-that-would-wish-us-well/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 17 Jan 2022 00:21:46 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://lifebydictionary.com/?p=439</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:image {"id":931,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none","className":"is-style-rounded"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large is-style-rounded"><img src="https://lifebydictionary.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/photo_2022-01-16_18-18-18-1024x768.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-931"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:separator -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">Stopped at 4 a.m. at an interstate rest-stop. Security guard came by and rapped his Maglite against the passenger-side window. "No sleeping here, sir."</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Bought a bag of cocaine from a trucker who was smoking a menthol by the vending machines. I pushed through Atlanta flying high again.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Oh glee! The snows fall off-season and scorching heat covers the crisp vegetation until it withers. The end is not a final act. The ending begins.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

		<title><![CDATA[plan b]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/plan-b/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 08 Aug 2021 23:07:11 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.lifebydictionary.com/wordpress/?p=816</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Gauntlet tossed.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":818,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="http://www.lifebydictionary.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/photo_2021-08-08_18-05-15-1024x752.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-818"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><s>Looks like I'm throwing everything away again.</s> The FUCK I AM. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I am here to stay.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

						</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Spirit Asylum Entry]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/spirit-asylum-entry/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 11 Aug 2021 11:52:56 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.lifebydictionary.com/wordpress/?p=829</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:image {"id":830,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none","className":"is-style-rounded"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large is-style-rounded"><img src="http://www.lifebydictionary.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/photo_2021-08-11_06-48-26-768x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-830"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The looking-glass is backwards. The days are nesting dolls: a Trojan Horse inside the next. One contains hope another maybe love, and the final boss revealed at the break-light moment of death presents only clarity. The What-Ifs mariachi band plays stage right. Listen to the happiness. Come, scythe, and guide us to the feeding trough. . .</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[response > reaction]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/response-reaction/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 02 Sep 2021 13:04:49 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.lifebydictionary.com/wordpress/?p=849</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I remember the micro-lies that have propped my age of addiction.  Or only recall a few loose threads set free from the veil of deception. Was it a different or real ME that was down at the bottom? Unadulterated and full-speed engagement of desire and lust? Negative astral projection.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>No. I am something more.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:separator -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Ambiguity: that refuge of prompt succor. Let the revelation wrap itself in fictions here and not ones left to rot in my mind.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Begin again.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:separator -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I am sober and clean (so clean, clean). And now, Hurricane Ida to face. I am here for greater experiences, and just now, on the back end of living, realize this experience is not to continue to be lost inside of myself, but to share and give back to a world that I am blessed enough to help, and help improve. <em>That's a-lotta commas!</em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><em><strong>Let us go then, you and I. . .</strong></em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:separator -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>I have constructed a modernized dictionary. Come with me and listen with caution and care.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[858]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Self-Proving Affidavit]]></title>
		<link>http://www.lifebydictionary.com/index.php/self-proving-affidavit/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 05 Sep 2021 10:48:26 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Kenneth]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.lifebydictionary.com/wordpress/?p=859</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"dropCap":true} -->
<p class="has-drop-cap">Mutual aid groups, loosely gathered ad-hoc bands of friends, co-workers, neighbors, extended families (blood &amp; beyond): all of these <em>people </em>are what kept society bound together during crises of 2019-2022. Op-eds from NYT are better used to wrap up crawfish shells, and the balled wad of a great meal stuffed under the rest of the garbage. Let the dead read the papers instead. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Action is key. Decision and follow through. Not finger-wringing contemplation. Sell those elixirs elsewhere, carpet-bagger.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:separator -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It's only been two weeks but damn! the distance from that life seems further behind me. What did two weeks reveal to me? That compassion isn't blood-bound. When life crumbled around me, and <em>because of me, </em>it was the kindness of a lover and grace from strangers that kept me upright and moving forward. Push, kick, push. . . </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Family fails: yet another constant to add to the calculator. File this one in my dictionary under <strong>apropos</strong>,</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":860,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none","style":{"color":{"duotone":["#000000","#ffffff"]}}} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://www.lifebydictionary.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/photo_2021-09-05_05-46-08-768x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-860"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>859</wp:post_id>

		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2021-09-05 10:48:26]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2021-09-05 10:48:26]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2021-09-05 10:48:26]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[self-proving-affidavit]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
